15:06 <vmassol> Enygma`: I thouht we had discussef/agreed about this already…. http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6239?focusedCommentId=86479&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-86479  
15:06 <vmassol> \*discussed  
15:07 <vmassol> (when we did verbal brainstorming the other day)  
15:09 <Enygma`> we discussed something else  
15:09 <Enygma`> if a watchlist job can specify a different template to use  
15:10 <Enygma`> you can not let the user decide the entire template to use  
15:10 <vmassol> it's the same thing I believe  
15:10 <Enygma`> there could also be security issues  
15:10 <Enygma`> etc  
15:10 <vmassol> ??  
15:11 <Enygma`> the watchlist job is executed with high privileges  
15:12 <vmassol> that's not a problem  
15:12 <Enygma`> my idea of allowing extensions to the watchlist template is in the rendering of actual events  
15:12 <Enygma`> not in the complete replacement of the watchlist template  
15:12 <vmassol> but we need various templates anyway  
15:13 <Enygma`> why?  
15:13 <vmassol> and it's easy to not have security issues  
15:13 <vmassol> same answer as why we wuld want several skins for the wiki  
15:14 <Enygma`> why position the template choice at the user level?  
15:14 <Enygma`> and not at the admin level?  
15:14 <vmassol> if all you need is a secure list of templates, just make it an admin feature to list the avail templates in the wiki  
15:14 <Enygma`> it's not about choosing the color of the skin  
15:14 <Enygma`> does not make sense to me  
15:15 <vmassol> check my comment  
15:15 <vmassol> what you did is very fragile  
15:15 <vmassol> and is no correct  
15:15 <vmassol> if you allow devs tp cutomize templates  
15:15 <vmassol> which we must allow  
15:15 <Enygma`> neither is the option to allow users to specify the template to use, IMO  
15:16 <Enygma`> you allow devs to customize THE watchlist template, on certain extension points  
15:16 <vmassol> that"s awful  
15:16 <vmassol> big -1  
15:16 <vmassol> sorry  
15:16 <Enygma`> or, you allow admins to use a completely diferent template  
15:16 <Enygma`> but not users  
15:16 <Enygma`> maybe we have different pictures in mind about this  
15:17 <vmassol> we can talk  
15:18 <DarkKnightCZ> mflorea: hi, XWIKI-11985 is still broken if you use something else except document entity (for example space and possibly even wiki entity if it can be used), I narrowed it down to evaluate macro in getPath macro in DocumentTreeMacros, which should return also space (or separate check if root entity isn't document)... i can look at it on Monday
